decent fun.  Watch for updates.  Old school players got great practice with flashlight hacks when they were unchecked back in the day so you'll always be at the bottom of the pecking order skillwise... but given rank resets there's still some possibility of fun with this game every now and then.

This game is very 50/50. Go against a freddy or camping leather face and it will likely result in you uninstalling this game. However, there's a lot of value and fun in this game. But, it does require you to spend hours trying to find a playstyle to your liking which can be off putting to many. Try to get friends to play with as playing by yourself is very draining in many circumstances. I have more hours in total added with my other account about 170-200.
Very fun for horror fans! if you love high suspense you got to give this game a try. With the variety of different killers and survivors it truly is the best

Murder is acceptable, sometimes.

It's stressful and scary at first but playing with friends usually takes that away.
After that it's just stressful and salty. 

I've met a lot of other friendly survivors and streamers playing this game that are really good, and really fun to watch, play with, or play against.
There's also a really toxic community that comes with any competitive game. Don't expect to get into this game without getting tilted at least sometimes, if not often.

At the end of the day, do I recommend this game? Yes. It's one of my favorite multiplayer games. Give it a shot if you like it or not.

This game and the community that drives it and markets it, especially in the Twitch/streaming world, raised weekly wrist cutting habits by about 4-5 times more per week. My suicidal thoughts are countless now as well. I think I'm gonna uninstall this game and go outside for a walk cause at least I have legs.

EDIT 3: it's going free on EPIC GAMES and possibly will be removed from steam in near future due to NFT issues with hellraiser chapter... I swear don't buy any DLCs like I did...

Eigentlich ein echt cooles Game für zwischendurch...
Aber das wars dann auch, das Spiel macht echt Laune, wenn man mit Menschen aus seiner Elo zusammenspielt... das kommt leider bei DBD viel zu kurz... als Killer wird man ständig mit Leuten zusammengematched, die lvl 4 oder so im Rank sind und da man außer das normale Game kein anderes Ranking System hat, ist man gezwungen auch mit "besseren" Menschen zusammen zu spielen.... Spieler mit guten Perks werden mit Killern die gerade erst anfangen das Spiel zu spielen zusammengewürfelt, was für eine Katastrophe.... nicht nur, dass es als Killer ziemlich schwer ist gegen 4 Spieler alleine zu spielen, es kommt noch dazu, dass dich diese Leute einfach nur taunten wollen, weil man ja noch ka vom Game hat oder einfach zu schlechte Perks freigeschaltet hat. ziemlich schlecht wenn ihr mich fragt... an sich eine sehr gute Idee, aber man braucht auch sehr viele Stunden in dem Spiel damit man überhaupt auch mal lernt wie es richtig funktioniert, ohne ständig mit erfahrenen Spielern spielt.
very fun to play but it can be a little frustrating but most games are at some point nonetheless i still highly recommend this game and its dlc's
